entry.title: Hello, World!
entry.content:
Hello, world!

Becker Ltd has a simple mission. Share knowledge, and provide professional and affordable services to individuals and businesses. Becker Ltd was started by Ron Becker after years of working in various fields, and gathering a large amount of knowledge and experience. He had grown tired of seeing individuals and small to medium sized businesses struggle to stay current, and keep up with big corporations.

After a few years of “working out the kinks” he decided it was time to start offering his skills and experience at a price that was fair, and easily manageable for all those that larger agencies had left behind.

“The more that you read, the more things you will know. The more that you learn, the more places you’ll go.”

-Dr. Seuss

Read, learn, grow, share, and see how far you can go!

He had grown tired of seeing individuals and small to medium sized businesses struggle to stay current, and keep up with big corporations.
